info.title: Laravel Book Management API
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation untuk sistem manajemen buku dengan Laravel dan Sanctum authentication. Menyediakan fitur CRUD untuk books, user management, dan sistem peminjaman buku dengan validasi stock.

post.description: Login user dengan email dan password
Register user baru dengan name, email, dan password

get.description: Get data user yang sedang login

get.summary: Get all books with pagination and filters
get.description: Retrieve books dengan pagination, search dan filter berdasarkan author, year, atau title

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search keyword for title, author, or ISBN

get.description: Retrieve book berdasarkan ID dengan informasi stock tersedia

put.description: Update book berdasarkan ID dengan validasi

delete.description: Delete book berdasarkan ID (tidak bisa dihapus jika sedang dipinjam)

409.description: Cannot delete book with active loans

message.example: Cannot delete book with active loans

post.description: User meminjam buku dengan validasi stock

400.description: Book not available or already borrowed by user

message.example: Book is not available for loan

get.description: Get all loans for the authenticated user

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by loan status (borrowed, returned, overdue, all)

get.summary: Get user's borrowed books by user ID
get.description: Daftar buku yang sedang dipinjam oleh user

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by loan status (borrowed, returned, or all)

400.description: Book already returned or invalid loan

tags.name: Book Loans
tags.description: API endpoints untuk book loan management
